Class PrintSpecs

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw5.PrintSpecs

  • public class PrintSpecs
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to support the printing of different file parameters.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB

    • Method Detail

      • setSizeOfPrintedSpecs

        public static void setSizeOfPrintedSpecs(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPrintSpecs)
        Method used to set the elements of the private list sizeOfPrintedSpecs to the biggest needed value. This method is needed so the printed field would be aligned.
        Parameters:
        files - list of files that will be printed
        listOfPrintSpecs - list of user-required printing specifications

      • printFiles

        public static void printFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> listOfSubFiles,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPrintSpecs)
        Method used to print the required files and all of their parameters
        Parameters:
        listOfSubFiles - list of files to be printed
        listOfPrintSpecs - list of parameters that need to be printed for each file

      • printBorder

        public static void printBorder(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfPrintSpecs)
        Method used to print the border of the printed field.
        Parameters:
        listOfPrintSpecs - list of the user-required file parameters that need to be printed

      • createPrintSpec

        public static java.lang.String createPrintSpec(java.lang.String argument)
        Method used to determine which specification was requested by the user.
        Parameters:
        argument - string representation of the specification
        Returns:
        returns the requested specification
